## Base

```jsx
  const dummyData = [{name:'Item 1'},{name:'Item 2'},{name:'Item 3'},{name:'Item 4'},{name:'Item 5'},{name:'Item 6'},{name:'Item 7'},{name:'Item 8'},{name:'Item 9'},{name:'Item 10'},{name:'Item 11'},{name:'Item 12'},{name:'Item 13'},{name:'Item 14'},{name:'Item 15'},{name:'Item 16'},{name:'Item 17'},{name:'Item 18'},{name:'Item 19'},{name:'Item 20'},{name:'Item 21'},{name:'Item 22'},{name:'Item 23'},{name:'Item 24'},{name:'Item 25'}]

  const Template = ({ name }) => (
    <Card
      className="border border-solid border-default-400 bg-default-200 flex flex-col overflow-hidden pt-16 px-12 pb-12"
      style={{ width: '200px', minHeight: '200px' }}
    >
      <Text className="block m-auto">{name}</Text>
      <Button>Button</Button>
    </Card>
  )

  render(
    <Carousel
      template={Template}
      data={dummyData}
      description="Example"
      keyBy="name"
    />
  )
```

## Complex template
You can have a template with any logic and variation, as long as the width of all the items is the same.

```jsx

  const productData = [{description:"Organic - Apples - Honeycrisp",mainImage:"https://www.kroger.com/product/images/medium/front/0000000093283",maximumOrderQuantity:4,regularSecondaryDescription:"$2.99/lb",priceNormal:"2.25",soldBy:"Weight",quantityInCart:3},{featured:!0,description:"Granny Smith Organic Apples",mainImage:"https://www.kroger.com/product/images/medium/front/0000000094017",maximumOrderQuantity:6,minimumOrderQuantity:5,promoSecondaryDescription:"$1.99/lb",regularSecondaryDescription:"$2.49/lb",priceNormal:"1.4",priceSale:"1.12",soldBy:"Weight"},{featured:!0,description:"Apple & Eve Organics Apple Juice",mainImage:"https://www.kroger.com/product/images/medium/front/0007630175249",promoSecondaryDescription:"64 fl oz",regularSecondaryDescription:"$2.49/lb",priceNormal:"3.29",priceSale:"2.89",soldBy:"Unit",quantityInList:3,},{description:"Simple Truth Organicâ„¢ Baby Carrots",mainImage:"https://www.kroger.com/product/images/medium/front/0001111091659",regularSecondaryDescription:"1 lb",priceNormal:"1.69",soldBy:"Unit"},{description:"Avocado - Large",mainImage:"https://www.kroger.com/product/images/medium/front/0000000004225",regularSecondaryDescription:"1 ct",priceNormal:"2.50",soldBy:"Unit"},{description:"Mango - Red",mainImage:"https://www.kroger.com/product/images/medium/front/0000000004959",regularSecondaryDescription:"each",priceNormal:"1.25",priceSale:"0.99",soldBy:"Unit"},{description:"Grapes - Red - Seedless - Sold by the Bag - Estimated Bag Weight 2 Pounds",mainImage:"https://www.kroger.com/product/images/medium/front/0000000004023",regularSecondaryDescription:"$0.99/lb",priceNormal:"2.49",priceSale:"0.99",soldBy:"Weight"},{type:'link',description:'browse all products link'}]

  const ProductTemplate = ({
    featured,
    description,
    mainImage,
    priceSale,
    priceNormal,
    soldBy,
    promoSecondaryDescription,
    regularSecondaryDescription,
    maximumOrderQuantity,
    minimumOrderQuantity=0,
    quantityInList=0,
    quantityInCart=0
  }) => (
    <>
      {featured && <Text size="xs" className="absolute m-0" style={{top: "6px"}}>Featured</Text>}
      <div className="my-16 mx-auto w-full align-center justify-center overflow-hidden" style={{height: "150px"}}>
        <Link withRouter={false}>
          <div className="m-auto flex justify-center align-center relative max-w-full max-h-full">
            <Image alt={description} style={{width: "150px", height: "150px"}} src={mainImage}/>
          </div>
        </Link>
      </div>
      <Price original={priceSale && Number(priceNormal)} relative={soldBy === "Weight"} value={Number(priceSale) || Number(priceNormal)} />
      <Heading className="mt-12 mx-0 mb-1" tag="h3" size="s">
        <Link withRouter={false} implied>{description}</Link>
      </Heading>
      <Text size="s" className="italic mb-16 mt-4">{promoSecondaryDescription || regularSecondaryDescription}</Text>
      <div className="mb-8">
        <Text size="s" className="text-positive-800 block">
          Pickup & Delivery Available
        </Text>
      </div>
      <div className="mt-auto">
        <div className="h-40"></div>
        <div className="w-full self-center text-center pt-8" style={{minWidth: "8.5rem"}}>
          <Stepper callToAction="Add to Cart" compact fullWidth kind="primary" max={maximumOrderQuantity || 99} minimumQuantity={minimumOrderQuantity} what={description} value={quantityInCart}/>
        </div>
      </div>
    </>
  )

  const LinkToBrowseAllTemplate = () => (
    <Link size="m" withRouter={false} className="justify-center m-auto w-1/2 pt-8 text-center" href="https://www.kroger.com/">Browse all products</Link>
  )

  const CarouselTemplate = ({ type="item", ...itemProps }) => (
    <Card className="ProductCard border border-solid border-default-300 flex flex-col overflow-hidden pt-16 px-12 pb-12 h-full" style={{width: "200px", minHeight: "490px"}}>
      {
        type === 'link'
        ? <LinkToBrowseAllTemplate />
        : <ProductTemplate {...itemProps} />
      }
    </Card>
  )

  render(
    <Carousel
      template={CarouselTemplate}
      data={productData}
      description='Products'
      style={{maxWidth: "860px"}}
      keyBy="description"
    />
  )
```
